item.title: From Academia to Industry: Insights from an AI/ML Engineer
item.description: ðŸ’« AI/ML Data Talks Podcast In this podcast episode I share with about my journey from academia to industry and share some insights into the latest AI and ML trends. We’ll talk about how important it is for AI systems to be able to communicate with each other, and how ZenML is helping with that. If you’re interested in pursuing a career in AI or ML, I’ve got some advice for you!
